title: Amazon MSK to Amazon S3 delivery using Amazon Kinesis Data Firehose
description: Create a Amazon Kinesis DataFirehose for processing and delivery of streaming data from Amazon MSK Apache Kafka clusters into data lakes stored on Amazon S3

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This sample project demonstrates how to use CDK v2 Python L1 and L2 Constructs to build Data pipeline. Creates MSK serverless cluster, Kinesis Data Firehose and S3 for processing and delivery of streaming data into data lakes
This example uses AWS CDK constructs

bullets.text: Amazon MSK now supports fully managed data delivery to Amazon S3 using Kinesis Data Firehose

text: See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.
